actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism

official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to remove the "last employer" limitation on the receipt of certain annuities in cases where the employment concerned is nonrailroad employment compensated at a rate not exceeding $4800 per annum.

summary.text: Amends the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to remove the "last employer" limitation on the receipt of certain annuities where the employment concerned is part-time nonrailroad employment and does not exceed a specified amount per annum.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to remove the "last employer" limitation on the receipt of certain annuities in cases where the employment concerned is nonrailroad employment compensated at a rate not exceeding $4800 per annum.
